thread.title: Re: University bans potentially triggering free speech delivery system, snowflake brigade declares ‘victory!!’
thread.title_full: Re: University bans potentially triggering free speech delivery system, snowflake brigade declares ‘victory!!’

author: raydrnayshon
title: Re: University bans potentially triggering free speech delivery system, snowflake brigade declares ‘victory!!’
text:
University bans potentially triggering free speech delivery system, snowflake brigade declares ‘victory!!’ Posted at 10:44 am   Doug P. 
A method of communication with the potential to offend and/or harass has been successfully stricken from dorm hallways at Michigan State University: MSU bans whiteboards to prevent offensive messages https://t.co/VnU9qWnnUd pic.twitter.com/gO6Ceo2Qh7 
— Campus Reform (@campusreform) February 22, 2017 
For now, the “all clear” has been sounded in campus safe spaces: "MSU Police have informed us that ALL dormitory white boards will be removed asap. Victory!!!" https://t.co/cZW6Em6LJK 
— Campus Reform (@campusreform) February 21, 2017 
The move that has whiteboard ban proponents declaring “victory” was reportedly made after an incident involving an offensive word written on a board outside a dorm room. As a result, all whiteboards are now banned. @campusreform How ironic that free speech is dying where it should be most free, on college campuses. 
— Poet Laborious (@ToddShaffer) February 22, 2017 @campusreform obviously the people who still used whiteboards didn't feel social media had replaced them. What a bizzare edict.
